author: Michael McWhertor
title: Pokémon Go adds remote raids and other changes to let people play from home
description: Niantic continues to modify Pokémon Go during the coronavirus pandemic, with Remote Raid Passes, daily bonus research tasks, Buddy gifts, and more coming to the mobile game.
